name: poppyGP
tagline: Grand Prix de Papaveraceae Suite d'Applications · GitHub Organization Pages
body:
Grand Prix de Papaveraceae
==========================

Overview
--------
This GitHub organisation contains the repositories housing the source code for the primary poppyGP components, currently under development:

 * __poppyGP-player__ - client-side application
 * __poppyGP-server__ - server-side application

A number of other repositories contain features, libraries, stylesheets, and other components that may be implemented in the future:

 * __poppyGP-embedapi__ - forked from the official UStream embedapi project
 * __poppyGP-schedule__ - a standalone full-stack implementation of the `playlist` module, instead using AWS Lambda functions to convert `xspf` playlists into `json` files, which are then stored in an AWS S3 bucket
 * __poppyGP-icons__ - library of national flags, racing flags, and miscellaneous icons (to be integrated into GPQuery-livery)


Contributing
------------

At the time of this writing, everything has been single-handedly created by yours truly.

I would love any opportunity to work alongside fellow developers who are also fans of the sport, so please leave a post on the /r/poppyGP subreddit if you wish to do so.  :)


Legal
-----
Copyright © 2012-2015, Jonathan Ho

If you wish to use and/or distribute any contents contained herein, i.e. these repositores, just send me a message and we'll sort something out amicably.  Cheers!
